name: Frictionless (simpllrr)
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Mouse to shoot, R to retry, get to the yellow exit, and watch your controls

G to disable shaking and M to mute music

Frictionless is an abstract top-down puzzler made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. This jam's theme was "Out of Control". Thus, Frictionless is a game where you run out of "control" - managing your options being a key element. The slippery floor of the test area doesn't help either, so do your best to not get stuck.
